item.title: Remove an orphaned VM from SCVMM
item.description: During a migration of a VM from a different cluster the job failed in SCVMM. The status of the VM in SCVMM Virtual Machine State is still “Starting”. In SCVMM I was unable to stop, repair or delete the VM. When looking on the Hyper-V host, the VM didn’t exist in Failover Cluster Manager or Hyper-V manager.
